name: Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
description:
Skyrim Cursor by KMV.

Global.
32x32.

Includes black pointers - :hover & :active.
No external mirror utilized - Integrated into BASE64.

Skyrim Cursor only (without Pointers):
https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/


Source:
1) https://tes-mods.fandom.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Mods_Wiki
2) https://images.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110213131405/elderscrolls/es/images/9/91/CursorSkyrim.png


Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community/p1

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

additional_info:
2019-10-02 Added two additional cursors, for Links and Link-Click
2019-10-09 Added more links to :hover
2019-10-11 Added :hovers
2019-10-14 Added :hovers
2019-10-15 Removed "li a *" from :hovers. Adjusted code to accommodate for "input" and forced native main cursors on "ul".
2019-11-10 Changed Description for Chrome users.
2019-12-28 Added general pointer "button" property (id)
2019-12-29 Added :hover + :active on volume sliders and menu button on userstyles.org. Added "div" to forceful list to override unwanted custom pointers.
2020-01-28 Added general pointer "close" class+id.
2020-02-01 Pointers added.
2020-04-23 Added Button Pointers.
2020-05-09 Broader compatibility with hovers
2020-05-13 Added pointers and clickers.
2020-07-10 Added pointers and clickers to Reddit.
2020-07-21 Fullscreen Cursor Hide on selected pages integrated. More to come in the future.
2020-07-23 Update of description and cursors.
2020-08-03 Update of pointers
2020-08-05 Added a pointer to YT following the recent update (New Menu Bar).
2020-08-21 Tweaked cursors in general volume sliders, and integrated Vimeo. Added a new pointer to Duckduckgo.
2020-10-20 General update of pointers.
2020-11-19 Update of pointers.
2020-11-29 Updated Pointers.
2020-12-01 Added a pointer. Updated description.
2020-12-16 Update of Cursor & Pointers.
2020-12-28 Update of Cursor & Pointers.
2021-03-23 Update of Pointers.
2021-04-06 Auto-hide of cursor on Bitchute Fullscreen integrated.
2021-06-16 Several new pointers added. Volume Sliders now have pointers instead of regular cursor.

/*
/*
/* i really want this to be global */
/* 
/* Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Cursor only (no pointers)
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/
/*
/* Stylus recommended:
/* https://add0n.com/stylus.html
/* 
/* Other Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact:
/* https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
/*
*/


/* Main Cursor */

body,
.front h2,
[class*="_0"],

{

}

/*Main Cursor - Forced*/

input,
ul,
[class*="fluid"],
body[class*="res-v"], body[class*="res-nightmode"][class*="res-v"],
[dir] .file-viewer video,
[id*="thing"],
#main-content,
#page [id*="_"],
#player-volume,
.player #player-controls-footer #player-volume,
#siteTable.sitetable.linklisting,
.col-sm-push-8 section.action-buttons-section,
.commentarea,
.disable-hover:hover,
.show-on-scroll-wrapper.show, :not(.has-banner-image).transparent-header .show-on-scroll-wrapper.show,
ul.flat-list.buttons,
.jwplayer.jw-stretch-uniform video,
.menuarea,
.panestack-title,
.player.scrubbing *,
.post-content,
.post-single-content.box.mark-links,
.r-1loqt21,
.res-nightmode .link,
.vjs-playing.vjs-has-started.vjs-user-active,
._1vyLCp-v-tE5QvZovwrASa,
._3QOPLw8PZipW3i8kDxod81,
._3UEq__yL-82zX4EyuluREz,
._3IYkqm44eWg992tFnELzuW._3nTkqMMtsoqxVmhplDRef3,
.fzTkuBRFT8iIn1XnJX_Yn path,.fzTkuBRFT8iIn1XnJX_Yn svg
{
    cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default !important;
}


/*Experimental*/

::select,
::selection
{
  cursor: text !important;
}


/*Fullscreen Cursor Hide*/

body.navia :-moz-full-screen,
[class*="fullscreen"] [class*="inactive"],
[class*="fullscreen"][class*="inactive"],
[style="cursor: none"],
.jw-flag-fullscreen.jw-flag-user-inactive div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset div.jw-media.jw-reset video.jw-video.jw-reset,
.player.player-cursor-hide,
.plyr:fullscreen.plyr--hide-controls,
.reddit-video-player-root::after,
.uvpjs--controlbar-hidden *,
.vjs-playing.vjs-has-started.vjs-user-inactive,
.ytp-autohide
{
    cursor: none !important;
}
